channel.title: .jar help?
channel.description:
Okay, so I recently downloaded .JAR Maker, and packaged my file (used tut on the forums here(its around page 2 or 3), and when i try to open it, i get this error:
Failed to load Main-Class manifest attribute from C:\Users\Ocean\Desktop\JARMaker\JAR Maker\lib\client.jar
Can anyone help please?

item.title: .jar help?
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Did you set your manifest options? Do you have the correct main class in the manifest?

Read full topic
